kingdom.quote: Медитація, медіація, медичний догляд: Спокій у собі є спокій для інших і є добробут для всіх.
kingdom.long_description: Люди пустелі давно зрозуміли, що щоб вижити, вони потрібні один одному, та їм потрібен кожний, хто може приєднатися до них. І отепер для будь-якого гостя вони є щедрими господарями, які мають доступ до товарів із усього світу.

mason_clay_chisel_recipe.description: The potter uses clay to bind wood and stone
mason_clay_chisel_recipe.flavor: 'The kiln tempers all things; witness how clay shall, by Monkey's alchemy, grow as strong as stone' --Master Erisa

mason_description.requirements: Requires a level 2 Potter and a Mason's Chisel, crafted by the Potter.

golden_gourd_curry_recipe.description: Чи більш стравні гарбузи, якщо їх приготувати?

flat_bread_recipe.description: Хліб, випечений з кукурудзяного борошна без закваски

meat_tagine_recipe.description: М'ясо та овочі, повільно тушковані у череп'яному горщику

vegetable_tagine_recipe.description: Овочі, повільно тушковані у череп'яному горщику

shop_info.name: Торговий караван Іскендеров
shop_info.title: Торговий караван Іскендеров привіз ще товарів!

bulletin_message.000: Haha, there's nothing like the sight of a brand new outpost, eh? With your hard work, this desolate land will soon a nexus of wealth and prosperity! We'll be back tomorrow with the whole store, but in the meantime, here's the starting stake your families sent along:
bulletin_message.001: Monkey keep you, friends! It's always a pleasure to see a party make it to their designated tradepoint. As per your contract, we'll be back with the whole store tomorrow. In the meantime, here are the starting supplies your families ordered for you:
bulletin_message.002: Iskender Traders is always looking for a new place to rest between routes. We're pleased to see you out here, friends! We'll be back with the store tomorrow, but in the meantime, have a sample of our goods, to get you started:
bulletin_message.003: All ready to start a new outpost, eh! My friends, the desert welcomes all its children. We'll be back tomorrow to check on you, but in the meantime, your parents sent these supplies, to get you started:
bulletin_message.004: Aha, a new potential partner for Iskender Traders! We must return tomorrow with the whole store, but tell you what: take this seed investment, and see what you can turn it into for us, eh?

shop_info.name: Vosker Saji's Polished Earths
shop_info.title: A master mason's cart draws near

shop_info.name: Rin's Fine Pelts and Rugs
shop_info.title: A wagon of fine animal goods approaches

shop_info.name: Rajin's Goods of the Distant West
shop_info.title: An exotic shop of rare woods arrives

shop_info.name: Farmer Gem's Farm Supplies
shop_info.title: Farmer Gem's supply cart rolls into town

rc_camp_standard_ghost.description: Щоб знати, де ви як вдома
